body_html:
Seems like a forced push erases your line comments, unfortunately. I have addressed your concerns earlier. Including indentation issues, removed unnecessary template parameter, documentation, and test matrices.

One thing I realized from looking at numpy code, shouldn't diagonals be where all the indices are the same instead of how it is now? I mostly reversed the diag operator for this commit though.

Thanks.

body:
Seems like a forced push erases your line comments, unfortunately.  I have addressed your concerns earlier.  Including indentation issues, removed unnecessary template parameter, documentation, and test matrices. 

One thing I realized from looking at numpy code, shouldn't diagonals be where all the indices are the same instead of how it is now?  I mostly reversed the diag operator for this commit though.

Thanks.
